
### adding linker stubs 

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column style="width: 20%; border: 3px solid; margin-top: 0"}
program.s:
```
main:
    ...
    call puts
    ...
```
:::

::: {.column style="width: 10%; max-width: 10%; font-size: 50pt; margin-top: 1em;"}

$\Rightarrow$

:::

::: {.column style="width: 60%; border: 3px solid; margin-top: 0" .transparent-code}
program.exe (psuedo-assembly):
```
GLOBAL_LOOKUP_TABLE:
    ... // placeholders

puts@plt:
    jmp *GLOBAL_LOOKUP_TABLE[index]
    ...
    ...

main:
    ...
    call puts@plt
    ...
```
<small>+ annotation where to fill `puts` address in lookup table</small>
:::

::::
